text: "Levels" (stylized as Le7els) is a song by Swedish house producer and DJ Avicii. It was released as a single on October 28, 2011 on Interscope records. The song was written by Avicii, Arash Pournouri, and Etta James. "Levels" samples vocals from Etta James's "Something's Got a Hold on Me" (1962). It is the same sample previously used in Pretty Light's Finally Moving. Additionally, the same sample was used by American rapper Flo Rida in his single "Good Feeling". Category:2011 songs Category:Avicii songs
title: Levels (Avicii song)
